DOC.brief_summary: This study examine relationship sleep timing insulin resistance adolescent obesity . The investigator also aim develop physiologically-based mathematical model adolescent sleep/wake circadian interaction .
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Timing Insulin Resistance Adolescents With Obesity
DOC.criteria: High school student age 1519 BMI > 90th percentile Tanner stage 2 great Any medication affect insulin resistance sleep ( e.g. , metformin , hormonal contraception , stimulant , atypical antipsychotic ) Regular use melatonin sleep aid A prior diagnosis obstructive sleep apnea , diabetes ( HbA1c > 6.5 ) , liver disease nonalcoholic fatty liver disease , pregnancy breastfeed IQ < 70 severe mental illness may impact sleep ( e.g. , schizophrenia , psychotic episode ) Not enrol traditional high school academic program ( e.g. , home school student ) Night shift employment Travel across 2 time zone month prior study
